title: The Experiment (CBS Playhouse)
text:
"The Experiment" is the third <a href="television%20play">television play</a> episode of the second season of the American television series "<a href="CBS%20Playhouse">CBS Playhouse</a>". Broadcast in February 1969 and it starred <a href="Michael%20Douglas">Michael Douglas</a> (credited as "M. K. Douglas") as a young scientist who puts aside his <a href="liberalism">liberal</a> principles to work for a cutting-edge chemical company.
"The Experiment" was Michael Douglas's first television role is the only "CBS Playhouse" installment written by a woman, <a href="Ellen%20M.%20Violett">Ellen M. Violett</a>, which earned her an <a href="Emmy%20award">Emmy award</a> nomination.
